name: Clash of Tank Ace - Tank Games
name_original: Clash of Tank Ace - Tank Games
description:
War has started. Commander! You have the mission to save the world!

It’s time to play the real-time multiplayer game everybody’s talking about!
Download now the best online war games for FREE!

This exciting tank strategy game offers you rich gameplays.You need to control one to six tanks,You need to command your own force of steel, out of the encirclement, going to the world!

Blitzkrieg:
This is a head-to-head confrontation between you and other real-time online commanders. Strength, luck and calm tactics will affect the final outcome. Here, how you play is the key to victory.

Battle map:
This is classic 3C confrontation battle. Your base will be exposed to the enemy's fire if any line to be destroyed. Therefore, you will have to compromise, layout your army in the most critical position. No matter how you layout your strength, concentrated or scattered, the two key points to victory: 1, army’s tank are annihilated, 2, The base of the army was destroyed. So, concentrated or scattered, all listen to your commands!

Real tank
Panzer, VI Ausf.E, Tiger I, Tiger II, M4, T-34, when you play this game, you can find a variety of classic tanks. All tanks, from appearance to various attributes, are based on real historical data.
1, heavy tanks with high defense and strong firepower, but the mobility is poor;
2, medium-sized tanks in the defense, firepower and mobility to achieve a compromise;
3, light tanks with high speed and high mobility, good at attacking the enemy from the rear;
4, anti-tank gun is a sniper, good at concealing and long-range attack the enemy;
5, self-propelled artillery has a long-range attack, it launched the howitzer can bypass the ground obstacles,damage multiple enemies by one time;
6, pay attention! Tank front armor, side armor and back armor thickness is not the same!


What are you waiting for?war is coming. let's go! For the final victory!
